data.actual_result: New Mentions button still appears at the bottom and does nothing when you press on it
data.expected_result: New Mentions appears only if channel is offscreen
data.short_description: New Mentions button appears and does nothing on tap if you're switching from a server with almost no channels to the server where you were pinged
data.steps_to_repro: - Create a new server and delete all categories and the voice chat to keep only the text channel - Switch to the server you just created if not already - Get pinged in a different server, in one of the top visible channels of the server (except the very first one) - Switch to the server where you were pinged
